/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead, providing shade and adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A small stream meanders through the center of the street, its waters reflecting the surrounding greenery and the blue sky above. Power lines stretch across the scene, a testament to the city's infrastructure. In the distance, buildings rise, their windows glinting in the sunlight, hinting at the bustling city life beyond the tranquil street.
